response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and carries a significant value of $15,000 to us. We believe it could hold a special place in your collection or business, offering unparalleled benefits and features. Considering its quality and potential impact, we are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. We hope this aligns with your expectations and budget, allowing you to experience the excellence this product has to offer.", "product_price": 12000}
